original_text: Someone had taught him the good news about the Lord Jesus. He liked to speak a lot to people about Jesus. The things that he taught were true. But he only knew part of God's message. He only knew the things that John taught about baptism.
korean_text: 그가 일찍이 주의 도를 배워 열심으로 예수에 관한 것을 자세히 말하며 가르치나 요한의 세례만 알 따름이라

sentences.original_text: the good news about the Lord Jesus
He liked to speak a lot to people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 많이 말하는 것을 좋아했다

sentences.original_text: The things that he taught were true
But he only knew part of God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 하나님의 메시지 일부만 알았다
